en-US.label: Accounts Manager
en-US.description: The Accounts app allows you to create, customize, and manage of all your client accounts.
en-US.extended_description: Accounts Manager is the ideal tool for managing multiple customer accounts. Save time and reduce stress with our streamlined interface. Add as many accounts as necessary with our true multi-tenant account structure. Give each sub-account the same functions as the parent account, reset devices, accounts, enforce specific limitations or restrict what the end user sees based on what your customer desires.
